It's worse than you thought: You or an ally make a suffer move (-2)
The victory is short-lived: A new complication or foe is revealed
You face collateral damage: Something is lost, damaged, or broken
Others pay the price: Someone else suffers the cost
Others won't forget: You are marked for vengeance
It gets complicated: The true nature of a foe or objective is revealed
You are dying. Within an hour or two, you must __Heal__ and raise your health above 0, or __Face Death__.
You are unconscious and out of action. If left alone, you come back to your senses in an hour or two. If you are vulnerable to ongoing harm, __Face Death__.
You are reeling and fighting to stay conscious. If you engage in any vigorous activity before taking a breather for a few minutes, roll on this table again (before resolving the other move).
You give in to fear or compulsion, and act against your better instincts.
Immediate catastrophic destruction. All aboard must __Endure Harm__ or __Face Death__, as appropriate.
Destruction is imminent and unavoidable. If you do not have the means or intention to get clear, __Endure Harm__ or __Face Death__, as appropriate.
Destruction is imminent, but can be averted if you __Repair__ your vehicle and raise its integrity above 0. If you fail, see 11-25.
You cannot __Repair__ this vehicle until you __Resupply__ and obtain a crucial replacement part. If you roll this result again prior to that, see 11-25.
The vehicle is crippled or out of your control. To get it back in action, you must __Repair__ and raise its integrity above 0.
It's a rough ride. All aboard suffer must make the __Endure Harm__, __Endure Stress__, or __Companion Takes a Hit__ move, suffering a serious (-2) cost.
You've lost fuel, energy, or cargo. __Sacrifice Resources (-2)__.
Against all odds, the vehicle holds together.
Immediate catastrophic destruction. All aboard must __Endure Harm__ or __Face Death__, as appropriate.
Destruction is imminent and unavoidable. If you do not have the means or intention to get clear, __Endure Harm__ or __Face Death__, as appropriate.
